Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

so i brought a satellite to polar orbit around the mun and congratulated myself to my hard work. Then it started mapping and I started doing other stuff, until everything was mapped and I was happy. It found some anomalies, one at -82, 102Ã‚Â° (approximate) and I went there.

Ok, not directly it was more or less a design a craft, design a craft with a rover, launch, orbit the mun, quickload, quickload, quickload, quickload, aaah f*** that I'll use mechjeb, land, BIG DISAPPOINTMENT!

What is there except a big hole and no sun? I drove around but found nothing! Any Tips?
There are some anomalies in the Mun that are buried ...
I think they are called monoliths? Not sure what they are thou.
Not all the anomalies are monoliths The Munar arches, some caves in some moons and various other stuff that I will not name are considered anomalies

Yeah, I wish some of them weren't underground. I have spent literally fifteen days looking for a certain Munolith I was able to decipher from hints and previous images of where it might be. After landing, hovering, and exploring the Northern Mountain range on Mun I finally gave up and just input some coordinates into mechjeb. What did I find?

I really hope that get's fixed. That was a huge disappointment for me, and by what you say it seems as if the south pole one is glitched as well. It makes me sad
sooo if they are buried... how do i get there?

I know they used to be reachable in earlier versions of the game. Still, I can personally confirm at least one of them is completely visible above ground.

[spoiler = Spoiler] The one near the equator [\spoiler]

And there are quite a few around Kerbin (5 I believe [i've only found one]) and one on Minmus.

Also, Nova stated before the update that their would be one outside of Kerbin's SOI, which I dobby think has been found yet; whether that was changed port not implemented I do not know.

Edited October 16, 2012 by AmpsterMan

I haven't visited the Munoliths since 0.17 came out, but I can assure you that in 0.16 they were all reachable. Only one of the Mun Arches was underground.

I wonder if Nova changed anything in the Mun's surface mesh.
